strings.Value: "Who are you and what have you done to Octavia?!"
"Do you really want this? But why? Aren't we happy as we are?"
"I never expected to hear this from you!"
"Our kingdom and our very lives are hanging by a thread. Let's put the wedding off until after the victory... My queen!"
"I love you, but I don't want a wedding. There's no ritual that can make us closer than we already are."
"{Name}, I wanted to say something... Just don't be surprised. This might sound strange, especially coming from me, but... but..."
{n}Octavia looks away, bites her lip and finally blurts out,{/n} "Let's get married!"
{n}Octavia laughs happily.{/n} "Funny, isn't it? I never thought I'd say those words! But... You see..."
"We are. Gods, I've never been so happy as when I'm with you. But it's not about that."

"All this time I've been so stupid! After all those years as a slave, I was so afraid of losing my freedom again, that I saw a threat where there wasn't one. You broke me free of my chains â€” but I was afraid you could put them back on me again!'

"I realize now I should not have been afraid like this. I pushed you away because I was afraid that you'd hurt me. I should have been afraid that you couldn't stand it and leave. And that's the scariest thing in the world!"
"That's why... I want to give my freedom to you. I know it will be safe in your hands."
"And I never expected to say it! But... You see..."
{n}Octavia kisses your lips.{/n} "Forget about the title. It's yours... Just yours."
{n}Octavia kisses your lips.{/n} "You're right. What's important is you are mine... And I'm yours."
